devdoc.details: Contract for locking up tokens for set periods of time  + optionally providing locked tokens with voting power

params.receiver: The address that has locked balances
The address that has locked balances
The address that has locked balances
The address that has locked balances

claimAllUnlockedTokens(uint256[]).details: Errors if no tokens are claimableIt is advised receivers check they are entitled to claim via `claimableBalance` before calling this

params.locks: The lock ids for unlocked token balances

claimUnlockedTokenAmounts(uint256[],uint.details: Errors if token amounts provided are > claimable amountsIt is advised receivers check they are entitled to claim via `claimableBalance` before calling this

params.amounts: The amount of each unlocked token to claim
params.locks: The lock ids for unlocked token balances

claimableBalance(uint256).details: Returns 0 if cliff duration has not ended

returns._0: The amount that can be claimed

params.cliffDaysToAdd: The number of days to add to cliff duration
params.lockId: The lock id for a locked token balance
params.vestingDaysToAdd: The number of days to add to vesting duration

params.amount: The amount of tokens being locked
params.grantVotingPower: if true, give user voting power from tokens
params.locker: The account that is locking tokens
params.receiver: The account that will be able to retrieve unlocked tokens
params.startTime: The unix timestamp when the lock period will start

lockTokensWithPermit(address,address,add.details: It is up to the frontend developer to ensure the token implements permit - otherwise this will fail

params.amount: The amount of tokens being locked
params.cliffDurationInDays: The lock cliff duration in days
params.deadline: The time at which to expire the signature
params.grantVotingPower: if true, give user voting power from tokens
params.locker: The account that is locking tokens
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.receiver: The account that will be able to retrieve unlocked tokens
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.startTime: The unix timestamp when the lock period will start
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature

params.receiver: The address that has unlocked balances

returns.balance: the total active balance of `token` for `receiver`

SECONDS_PER_DAY.details: Used to translate lock periods specified in days to seconds

devdoc.title: Vault

LockCreated(address,address,address,uint.notice: Event emitted when a new lock is created

LockExtended(uint256,uint16,uint16,uint1.notice: Event emitted when lock duration extended

UnlockedTokensClaimed(address,address,ui.notice: Event emitted when tokens are claimed by a receiver from an unlocked balance

activeLockBalances(address).notice: Get all active token lock balances for receiver

activeLockIds(address).notice: Get all active token lock ids for receiver

activeLocks(address).notice: Get all active token locks for receiver

allActiveLockBalances().notice: Get all active token lock balances

allActiveLockIds().notice: Get all active token lock ids

allLocks(address).notice: Get all token locks for receiver

claimAllUnlockedTokens(uint256[]).notice: Allows receiver to claim all of their unlocked tokens for a set of locks

claimUnlockedTokenAmounts(uint256[],uint.notice: Allows receiver to claim a portion of their unlocked tokens for a given lock

claimableBalance(uint256).notice: Get claimable balance for a given lock id

extendLock(uint256,uint16,uint16).notice: Allows receiver extend lock periods for a given lock

lockBalance(uint256).notice: Get lock balance for a given lock id

lockIds(address,uint256).notice: Mapping of address to lock id

lockTokens(address,address,address,uint4.notice: Lock tokens, optionally providing voting power

lockTokensWithPermit(address,address,add.notice: Lock tokens, using permit for approval

tokenLocks(uint256).notice: Mapping of lock id > token locks
